Review.Titre: HEAVEN SENT service living here in RD
Review.Contenu: I live on the southern coast of RD, in El Arroyo de Barahona.   This service has been invaluable during these months in cuarentena. I buy minutes for my mobile-CLARO-wifi on llamaRD, and then I am able to go online on the mi-claro site and activate my internet using the credit I buy here. I am able to completely avoid the long lines that I see in town at CLARO; people waiting in the blazing sun in a small area outside, in-front, face masks and gloves donned, waiting for their chance to get into the store.  As I pass by I am sooooo thankful for both LlamaRepublicaDominicana.com and for CLARO.com; their easy to use websites have been heaven-sent during the crisis and beyond!!
